rules_text:
Lifelink
At the beginning of your combat, mill two cards. When you do, up to one target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the greatest mana value among cards put into your graveyard this way.
flavor_text: [i]Long ago when Vryn's mana became sparse, spirits of the land manifested to protect the last vestiges of a forgotten age.[/i]
